content.text:
# National Library of the Republic of Tatarstan

The National Library of the Republic of Tatarstan () is the main state book depository in Tatarstan for national, republican, Russian and foreign publications. The library is located in Kazan, the capital of Tatarstan.
References
External links
* Interview with library staff and Mr. Razil Ismagilovich Valeev, Member of the Presidium of the State Sovet of the Republic of Tatarstan, Chairman of the Committee for Culture, Science, Education and National Questions. Kazan, 24 July 2008.
* Library website, http://kitaphane.tatarstan.ru/
